name: Felis
description: Felis is a Cat-Saving platformer.If you love cats, and enjoy the classic platformer genre, then this is the perfect combination for you.Goal:You are the cats' only salvation. Free them from their traps and have them follow you, and take them to safety. Not every cat will be easy to find. Make sure the whole team gets alive to the end.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3 4th gen Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Gtx 680 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: i5 5th gen and up Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Gtx 780 and up DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 800 MB available space
